page.title: 11THREE ALSAGER TEENAGERS
page.content: I interviewed three teenagers Matthew, Joanne and David. Matthew likes art, fishing and the guitar. His favourite music is reggae. He buys clothes, raggae records and a magazine called Echoes. Joanne likes going to parties, art, reading and classical and pop music. David likes Soft Cell and Siouxsie and the Banshees. He buys a magazine called Smash Hits. They all have one pet, Matthew a gerbil, Joanne a duck and David a dog. They like television programmes such as, Brookside, Eastenders and Dallas. Matthew delivers papers, cleans windows and does some labouring to earn money. Joanne babysits and David is on the dole. In September Joanne starts college, David a catering course and Matthew is still at school. He goes to bed at 10pm in the week and 11pm at weekends. By R.Broad.
